item.title: Will The Steam Machine Be Your Next Gaming PC... Or Console?
item.description: Valve's new Steam Machine is a smart little gaming PC that looks at home on a desk or under the TV. Could it pose a threat to games consoles too?

item.title: Europe’s Deforestation Deadlock Puts Business Credibility On The Line
item.description: Europe’s delay on its deforestation law risks new ESG liabilities as Borneo timber enters EU supply chains, testing traceability and credibility.
